c74object.name: crucible
c74object.digest: Selectively updates a dictionary by comparing incoming spans
c74object.description: The `crucible` object implements a challenger/incumbent system for updating a dictionary. It receives streams of messages representing musical spans (typically from `buildspans`) and stores them as a "challenger". When a complete span is received, it compares the rating of each bar in the challenger to the corresponding bar in an "incumbent" dictionary. The challenger only overwrites the incumbent if every bar rating is strictly higher.

inlet.description: Receives messages describing bars and spans (track::bar::key value or span list).
Sets a local bar length that overrides the buffer value. A value <= 0 reverts to using the buffer.

outlet.description: For a winning span, outputs 4-item data lists: [palette:symbol, track:int, bar:int, offset:float] or reach lists: [- track reach offset].
Outputs the symbol 'fill' whenever the song grows in reach.
Outputs the total song reach as an integer whenever the song grows.
Status messages when verbose attribute is enabled.

objarg.name: incumbent_dictionary_name
objarg.digest: The name of the incumbent dictionary
objarg.description: Specify the name of a dict object to use for comparisons.

attribute.name: verbose
attribute.description: When enabled (1), creates an additional outlet for status messages.

method.name: anything
method.description: Handles the hierarchical key/value messages and span lists from buildspans.

method.name: ft1
method.description: Sets the bar length in milliseconds in the second inlet (Inlet 2).
